mapper.select: SELECT op.ORDER_NUMBER, p.PRODUCT_ID, p.PRODUCT_NAME, op.ORDER_PRICE, op.ORDER_COUNT, o.RECEIVER_NAME, o.PHONE_NUMBER, o.ADDRESS, o.ORDER_REQUIRED, i.IMAGE_URL, IFNULL((SELECT IF(r.REVIEW_ID IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) FROM review r WHERE r.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID), 0) AS IS_WRITE, o.ORDER_DATE FROM order_product op JOIN product p ON op.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID JOIN orders o ON op.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID JOIN image i ON i.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE o.USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo} AND i.IMAGE_ID = (SELECT MIN(i2.IMAGE_ID) FROM image i2 WHERE i2.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID)

SELECT op.ORDER_NUMBER, p.PRODUCT_ID, p.PRODUCT_NAME, op.ORDER_PRICE, op.ORDER_COUNT, o.RECEIVER_NAME, o.PHONE_NUMBER, o.ADDRESS, o.ORDER_REQUIRED, i.IMAGE_URL, IFNULL((SELECT IF(r.REVIEW_ID IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) FROM review r WHERE r.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID), 0) AS IS_WRITE, o.ORDER_DATE FROM order_product op JOIN product p ON op.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID JOIN orders o ON op.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID JOIN image i ON i.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE o.USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo} AND i.IMAGE_ID = (SELECT MIN(i2.IMAGE_ID) FROM image i2 WHERE i2.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID)
AND o.ORDER_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{cond.clickedDuration} MONTH)
AND o.ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TIMESTAMP(#{cond.startDate}, '00:00:00') AND TIMESTAMP(#{cond.endDate}, '23:59:59')
AND p.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cond.searchText}, '%')
AND op.ORDER_NUMBER = #{cond.searchText}
